results.title: Generalized anxiety disorder in type 2 diabetes mellitus: prevalence and clinical characteristics
results.text_hl: Use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@ were associated with significantly lower @<m>DISEASE_general_anxiety_disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C000726808 @@@GAD@@@ rates among the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in this study.
